talents.name: SharpenedSpear
talents.label: Sharpened Spear
talents.description: Knight Statues buff all units vertically and horizontally aligned with them, increasing their damage by 0.8%. Each new Statue on an intersection increases the bonus damage. A Statue is active if there are no other Statues on the same intersection as it, regardless of how many Statues are on the battlefield.

talents.name: CovenantOfVeterans
talents.label: Covenant of Veterans
talents.description: Knight Statue increases its neighbors' damage by 0.8%. Every merge and increase in merge rank next to Knight Statue increases this bonus.

talents.name: Barrier
talents.label: Barrier
talents.description: The Knight Statue appears with a shield against negative effects. The shield has 2 charges. Once destroyed, the shield regenerates in 30s.

talents.name: RollCall
talents.label: Roll Call
talents.description: When one Knight Statue gets a bonus damage charge, other Statues have a 15% chance of receiving that bonus as well. This chance is unique to each statue.

talents.name: HoldTheLine
talents.label: Hold the Line!
talents.description: If all of Knight Statue's neighbors are the same unit, then, in addition to attack speed, it will also increase their critical damage by 10%.

talents.name: StoneLegion
talents.label: Stone Legion
talents.description: In addition to attack speed, Knight Statue increases unit critical damage by 0.7% for each merge rank of Statues on the battlefield.

talents.name: SoulOfAWarrior
talents.label: Soul of a Warrior
talents.description: While active, Knight Statue performs an area attack every 10s. The attack deals 50% of its critical damage value per merge rank and reduces monster armor by 20%. Its attack interval goes down 2s for every unit neighboring it.
